name: Cook the Book: Mexican Chicken Salad with Black Bean Salsa
description: Spring's here, it's warming up a bit where I am (at least for now), and that's got me thinking of picnicky foods. Like chicken salad. So for today's recipe from Nigella Express, I'm looking at the Mexican Chicken Salad she's...
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon kosher salt or 1/2 teaspoon table salt
A good grinding of black pepper
1 pound jicama, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch matchsticks (or 2 eight-ounce cans water chestnuts sliced into strips)

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the flesh out of the avocado; put flesh into blender with all other dressing ingredients. Process dressing till smooth.
Place all the salad ingredients into a large bowl, pour dressing over and toss to coat.
To Make Tomato and Black Bean Salsa

Drain and rinse the beans; mix beans in a bowl with the tomatoes, jalapeños, lime juice, and salt. Check seasoning, then serve with the salad above, either separately in a small bowl or on top of the salad itself.
